items.question: What is self check-in?
items.answer: Self check-in lets customers join your waitlist without staff assistance. They scan a QR code, visit a link, or use a tablet kiosk to enter their details and join the queue.

items.question: Do guests need the app to use self check-in?
items.answer: No. Self check-in works in any web browser. Guests scan a QR code or tap a link—no app download required.

items.question: How does self-check-in work during a rush?
items.answer: Self check-in actually shines during rush hours. Instead of a line at the host stand, guests join from their phones while waiting outside, at the bar, or even before they arrive.

items.question: Can I control when self check-in is available?
items.answer: Yes. You can turn it on/off and limit it to specific days or time windows (for example, only brunch hours).

items.question: Can I customize the check-in page to match my brand?
items.answer: Absolutely. Add your logo, choose your brand colors, customize the welcome message, and select which fields to show (name, phone, party size, seating preferences, etc.).
